ygData.subject: Re: HEY!
ygData.msgSnippet: Well, I for one was not on this last weekend, so I have no questions or comments. My Father-in-Law flew in for a week.  Was only ablt to play for a VERY short
ygData.messageBody:
Well, I for one was not on this last weekend, so I have
no questions or comments. My Father-in-Law flew in for a
week. Was only ablt to play for a VERY short time.

I have also put Cronik on hold for a bit to level a
newly created Druid. Since Monday I have been able to
make 2 bubs into 4th.
I made the Druid for when I get tired of the zones
Cronik fights in. So far Misty Thicket is pretty kewl,
and I can't wait for Qeynos Hills and the Karanas.
I should make 5th or even 6th by the end of the night. :)
Depends on how good the hunting is and how much havok
the kiddies cause. Heh.

What level are you Beld? What server are you on?
I have been wanting to ask you that for quite a while.
You may have posted it, but I missed it. :)

--
Cronik Khaos <Brethren of ill Omen>
Left Hand of Thule the Pain Bringer
15th Season Troll SK
Bertoxxulous

--
Andon
4th Season Halfling Druid
Bertoxxulous



>From: Grant Vanderhule <vandergm@...>
>
>where are all the nice posts like we've had this past couple weeks?
:)
